questions: Can you provide examples of projects you have worked on in Information Technology during your 6 years of experience?
How have you stayed updated with the latest trends and technologies in the IT industry during your professional gap for personal development?
What specific experiences do you have with Java, AWS, and Kubernetes? Can you share any success stories or challenges you faced while working with these technologies?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting in IT projects?
Can you discuss a situation where you had to quickly adapt to a new technology or tool in a project? How did you handle the learning curve?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively in a fast-paced IT environment?
Have you worked in a team setting on IT projects? If so, can you describe your role and contributions to the team?
How do you ensure the security and scalability of IT solutions you develop or work on?
Can you discuss any certifications or additional training you have completed to enhance your skills in Java, AWS, and Kubernetes?
How do you see yourself contributing to a team or organization with your expertise in IT and the key skills you possess?
